title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.3 - Time of payment of prize
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.3 - Time of payment of prize

State Regulations

Payment of a prize shall be made only after the prize
claim form has been filed, validated and verified, and the claimant has been
identified to the satisfaction of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5002.3

Amended

New

York State Register April 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 15, eff. 4/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
